parlimenthu manthriwaru[sanskaranaya] suchiya   swadhina     shri lanka nidahas pakshaya     eksath jathika pakshaya   mathiwaranaya manthriwaraya pakshaya kala simawa 1947 ech. bi. thennakon 1947-1956 1952 1956 tikiri banda thennakon shri lanka nidahas pakshaya 1956-1977 marthu 1960 juli 1960 1965 1970 1977 ke. dab. aar. em. eekanayaka eksath jathika pakshaya 1977-1989 aashritha[sanskaranaya] ↑ "da ilektaral sistam".

ranuka mata kiyala thiyenawa rata enna kiyala..eth mama kohomada rata yanne..anika ranukge mama mata kamathi weyada..ranuka nathiwa mama kohoamda inne...amilata dukak denna amata uwamanawak na..eya paw...mamath aadare nisa hugak duk widala thiyenawa...mama karana wade waradi kiyala mama dananawa...mama badina dawasa mathaka wenakotath mata bayayi...thaniyama inna thiyenawan hodayi...mata kawada hari hodatama adanna wenawa...mama edata bayayi...mata hamadema thiyenawa...eth hamadema aduyi wage...
